org.activebpel.rt.war.tags
Class AeAbstractBeanPropertyTag

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagSupport
      javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.BodyTagSupport
          org.activebpel.rt.war.tags.AeAbstractResourceTag
              org.activebpel.rt.war.tags.AeAbstractBeanPropertyTag
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.BodyTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.IterationTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.JspTag, java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.Tag
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeAbstractFormPropertyTag, AeAbstractPropertyFormatterTag, AeCollectionIteratorTag, AeGetPropertyTag, AeGetResourceTag, AeIfPropertyMatchesTag, AeIfTrueTag, AeIndexedPropertyTag, AeQNamePropertyTag, AeSetPropertyTag, AeSetResourceTag
public abstract class AeAbstractBeanPropertyTag
extends AeAbstractResourceTag

Provides support for reading a property from another bean within the page context.

See Also:
Serialized Form

getPropertyFromBean

protected java.lang.Object getPropertyFromBean(java.lang.Object aBean,
                                               java.lang.String aProperty)
                                        throws javax.servlet.jsp.JspException
Invokes the bean's property and returns the value. The bean's property name can have method names chained using the dot as a seperator. E.g. customer.address.city is equivalent to getCustomer().getAddress().getCity().

Parameters:
aBean -
aProperty -
Returns:
bean property value.
Throws:
javax.servlet.jsp.JspException

getPropertyFromBean

protected java.lang.Object getPropertyFromBean(java.lang.Object aBean,
                                               java.lang.String aProperty,
                                               java.lang.Class aReturnType)
                                        throws javax.servlet.jsp.JspException
Invokes the bean's property and returns the value. The bean's property name can have method names chained using the dot as a seperator. E.g. customer.address.city is equivalent to getCustomer().getAddress().getCity().

Parameters:
aBean -
aProperty - method name.
Returns:
bean property value.
Throws:
javax.servlet.jsp.JspException
